casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: B.O.A. No. 264PA18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Edward Eldred, Attorney at Law, for Barber, Lauren Erica Holly Williamson Batten, N. Kyle Hicks, Oxford, C. Gill Frazier, II, Attorneys at Law, for Granville County DSS Derek Martin Bast, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for B.O.A.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 21st of August 2018 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of August 2018 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
